fw.name: Drafting2DLInterfaces
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CAT2DLDrawingServices
class.abstract: Class of services providing a method to extract a drawing from a 2D Layout.

method.name: Extract2DLayoutToDrawing
method.abstract: Extracts the content of a 2D Layout toward an existing drawing.

class.name: CAT2DLayoutServices
class.abstract: This toolbox purposes services to create or Retrieve a 2D Layout Root from a Mechanical Part.

method.name: CreateLayout2DL
method.abstract: Creates a 2D Layout Root from a Mechanical Part.

method.name: GetAvailable2DLayoutStandards
method.abstract: Gets list of available 2D Layout standards.

method.name: GetLayout2DL
method.abstract: Gets the 2D Layout Root Object From a Mechanical Part.

method.name: GetListOfSheetStyles
method.abstract: Gets list of available sheet styles for a defined standard.

enum.name: CAT2DLViewSide
enum.abstract: CAT2DLViewSide is used in conjonction with a reference View2DL and a ViewBox.

enum.name: CatClippingFrameReframeOnMode
enum.abstract: At creation of a view the clipping frame is reframed on.

enum.name: CatDedicatedFilterType
enum.abstract: Specifies if the dedicated filter mask or not the background.

enum.name: CatViewBackgroundMode
enum.abstract: The way the background of a view is displayed at creation.

enum.name: CatViewFilterCreationMode
enum.abstract: At creation of a view, this enum defines how the filter of this view is configured.

class.name: CATI2DLBackWkbAddin
class.abstract: Interface of 2D Layout For 3D Design workbench.

class.name: CATI2DLMainWkbAddin
class.abstract: Interface of 2D Layout For 3D Design workbench.

class.name: CATI2DLayoutClipping
class.abstract: This interface manages the clipping applied by a 2D Layout View.

method.name: GetBackClippingActivation
method.abstract: Gets the activation of the back clipping plane.

method.name: GetBackClippingOffset
method.abstract: Gets the offset of the back clipping plane from the view plane.

method.name: GetClipCircle
method.abstract: Gets the data for the circle clipping profile.

method.name: GetClipPolygon
method.abstract: Gets the data for the polygon clipping profile.

method.name: GetClipProfileMode
method.abstract: RoleGets the mode of clipping profile.

method.name: GetClipRectangle
method.abstract: Gets the data for the rectangle clipping profile.

method.name: IsBackClippingOffsetDefined
method.abstract: Checks if the the offset of the back clipping plane is defined.

method.name: IsClipCircleDefined
method.abstract: Checks if the circle data are defined.

method.name: IsClipPolygonDefined
method.abstract: Checks if the polygon data are defined.

method.name: IsClipRectangleDefined
method.abstract: Checks if the rectangle data are defined.

method.name: SetBackClippingActivation
method.abstract: Sets the activation of the back clipping plane.

method.name: SetBackClippingOffset
method.abstract: Sets the offset of the back clipping plane from the view plane.

method.name: SetClipCircle
method.abstract: Sets the data for the circle clipping profile.

method.name: SetClipPolygon
method.abstract: Sets the data for the polygon clipping profile.

method.name: SetClipProfileMode
method.abstract: Sets the mode of the clipping profile.

method.name: SetClipRectangle
method.abstract: Sets the data for the rectangle clipping profile.

method.name: AddSheet
method.abstract: This method is used to create a 2DL sheet in the 2D Layout.

method.name: GetActiveSheet
method.abstract: Gets the active sheet in the 2D Layout.

method.name: GetActiveView
method.abstract: Gets the active view in the 2D Layout.

method.name: GetSheets
method.abstract: Returns the sheets referenced by the 2D Layout.

method.name: GetViews
method.abstract: Returns the views referenced by the 2D Layout.

method.name: RemoveSheet
method.abstract: This method is used to remove a sheet in the 2D Layout.

method.name: ReorderSheets
method.abstract: Changes the positions of the sheets in a 2D Layout according to the given ordered list.

method.name: SetActiveSheet
method.abstract: Sets the active sheet in the 2D Layout.

method.name: ValidateSheetOrder
method.abstract: Validates that the given ordered list can be used as an input for ReorderSheet.

method.name: CreateAuxiliaryView2DL
method.abstract: Creates an auxiliary or a section View2DL from a given View2DL.

method.name: CreatePrimaryView2DL
method.abstract: Creates a primary View2DL.

method.name: CreateRelatedView2DL
method.abstract: Creates a projection or isometric View2DL from a given View2DL.

method.name: CreateView2DLFromFTA
method.abstract: Creates a 2DL view from FTA Capture or View.

method.name: GetBackgroundView
method.abstract: Gets the background view in the sheet.

method.name: GetDefaultActiveView
method.abstract: Gets the view which have to be activated in the sheet.

method.name: GetLayout
method.abstract: Gets the layout root containing this sheet.

method.name: GetProjectionMethod
method.abstract: Gets the projection method in this sheet.

method.name: GetViews
method.abstract: Returns the view referenced by the sheet.

method.name: IsCurrent
method.abstract: This method is used to know if the sheet is the current one in the Layout.

method.name: IsDetail
method.abstract: Used to know if a sheet can be used to as a detail sheet.

method.name: ReorderViews
method.abstract: Change the positions of the views in a sheet according to the given ordered list.

method.name: SetDefaultActiveView
method.abstract: The active view is the view in edition.

method.name: SetPrintArea
method.abstract: Sets a set of coordinates to define a rectangle print area.

method.name: SetPrintAreaActivationState
method.abstract: Activates or deactivates the print area.

method.name: SetProjectionMethod
method.abstract: Sets the projection method in this sheet.

method.name: SetScale
method.abstract: Sets the global scale associated to the sheet.

method.name: ValidateViewOrder
method.abstract: Validates that the given ordered list can be used as an input for ReorderViews.

class.name: CATI2DLayoutView
class.abstract: this interface manages the 2D Layout View.

method.name: Activate
method.abstract: Used to Activate the view.

method.name: GetAngle
method.abstract: Gets the view orientation in the sheet.

method.name: GetAxisData
method.abstract: Returns the coordinates of the view coordinate system origin.

method.name: GetComponents
method.abstract: Used to get the view components (annotations, geometry, callout, .

method.name: GetOleSiteList
method.abstract: Gets the list of OLE sites of the views.

method.name: GetScale
method.abstract: Gets the view scale.

method.name: GetSheet
method.abstract: Gets the 2DL sheet containing the view representation.

method.name: GetViewLink
method.abstract: Gets the information concerning the view position rule.

method.name: GetViewName
method.abstract: Gets the view name as a string.

method.name: GetViewNameFormula
method.abstract: Gets the view name formula.

method.name: GetViewType
method.abstract: Gets the view type.

method.name: GetVisu2DMode
method.abstract: Gets the 2D mode for background visualization of the view.

method.name: GetVisuBackgroundMode
method.abstract: Gets the 2D-3D background visu mode of the view ie in the 3D windows and in the background of each view in every 2D context.

method.name: GetVisuIn3DMode
method.abstract: Gets the 3D visualization mode of the layout in the 3D Viewer.

method.name: IsActive
method.abstract: Used to know if this view is active.

method.name: IsFrameVisible
method.abstract: Used to know if the dynamic frame showing the view bounding box is visible.

method.name: LinkWith
method.abstract: Used to link the view in position with an other one.

method.name: SetAngle
method.abstract: Sets the view orientation in the sheet.

method.name: SetAxisData
method.abstract: Sets the coordinates of the view coordinate system origin.

method.name: SetFrameVisibility
method.abstract: Description : Sets the view frame visibility.

method.name: SetScale
method.abstract: Sets the view scale.

method.name: SetViewName
method.abstract: Sets the view name as a string.

method.name: SetVisu2DMode
method.abstract: Sets the 2D mode for background visualization of the view.

method.name: SetVisuBackgroundMode
method.abstract: Sets the 2D-3D background visu mode of the view.

method.name: SetVisuIn3DMode
method.abstract: Sets the 3D visualization mode of the layout in the 3D Viewer.

class.name: CATID2o2DLSettingAtt
class.abstract: Interface to access to settings of 2DLayout For 3D Design product.

method.name: GetActivate2DMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the Activate2DMode attribute.

method.name: GetActivate2DModeInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the Activate2DMode parameter.

method.name: GetBackClippingPlane

method.name: GetBackClippingPlaneInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the BackClippingPlane parameter.

method.name: GetBoundaries2DLColor

method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the Boundaries2DLColor parameter.

method.name: GetBoundaries2DLDisplay

method.name: GetBoundaries2DLDisplayInfo

method.name: GetBoundaries2DLLineType

method.name: GetBoundaries2DLLineTypeInfo

method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the Boundaries2DLThickness parameter.

method.name: GetClippingFrame

method.name: GetClippingFrameInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the ClippingFrame parameter.

method.name: GetClippingFrameReframeOnMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the ClippingFrameReframeOnMode attribute.

method.name: GetClippingViewOutlineColor

method.name: GetClippingViewOutlineColorInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the ClippingViewOutlineColor parameter.

method.name: GetClippingViewOutlineLinetype
method.abstract: Retrieves the ClippingViewOutlineLinetype attribute.

method.name: GetClippingViewOutlineLinetypeInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the ClippingViewOutlineLinetype parameter.

method.name: GetClippingViewOutlineThickness
method.abstract: Retrieves the ClippingViewOutlineThickness attribute.

method.name: GetClippingViewOutlineThicknessInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the ClippingViewOutlineThickness parameter.

method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the CreateAssociativeUseEdges parameter.

method.name: GetDedicatedFilterType

method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the DisplayClippingOutline parameter.

method.name: GetEditDedicatedFilterDialogBox
method.abstract: Retrieves the EditDedicatedFilterDialogBox attribute.

method.name: GetEditDedicatedFilterDialogBoxInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the EditDedicatedFilterDialogBox parameter.

method.name: GetHideIn3D
method.abstract: Retrieves the HideIn3D attribute.

method.name: GetHideIn3DInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the PreventFileNew parameter.

method.name: GetLayoutDefaultRenderStyle
method.abstract: Retrieves the default render style attribute value to apply to a Layout at its creation.

method.name: GetLayoutDefaultRenderStyleInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the setting info correspondnig to the default render style attribute.

method.name: GetPropagateHighlight
method.abstract: Retrieves the PropagateHighlight attribute.

method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the PropagateHighlight parameter.
